entry.title: Panama Residecy
entry.summary:
Vendor: Bitcoin Capitalist
Type:
Price: 5000.00

Embark on a Thriving Journey: Establish Your Residency in Panama

Explore the possibilities of temporary residency in Panama through the establishment of a Panama corporation and self-employment. By creating a Panama corporation and becoming an employee, you can qualify for temporary residency. After a period of two years, you have the opportunity to apply for permanent residency, solidifying your ties to this remarkable country. Panama, recognized as the Switzerland of Latin America, stands as an international hub with exceptional infrastructure and amenities. With a flourishing economy and world-class facilities, Panama offers an ideal environment to plant the flag of your residency and thrive in a nation that embraces progress and opportunities. Take the first step towards an exciting future in Panama, where the possibilities are endless.

entry.title: Panama Residency by Investment
entry.summary:
Vendor: Bitcoin Capitalist
Type:
Price: 5500.00

Panama offers an investment visa program that allows foreigners to obtain temporary or permanent residency by investing in real estate or other businesses in the country. The minimum investment required for temporary residency is $200,000, while for permanent residency, it is $400,000. This residency package will cover all your legal expenses to the get the process started.

entry.title: Panama Pensionado Permanent Residency
entry.summary:
Vendor: Bitcoin Capitalist
Type:
Price: 4000.00

Experience a Smooth Path to Permanent Residency: Unlock Your Dreams in Panama's Pensionado Program

Discover the unparalleled ease and simplicity of obtaining permanent residency in Panama through its renowned retirement program, the Pensionado Program. Among the various permanent residency programs in Latin America, Panama offers a straightforward process with no age limit, deposit, or investment requirement. Experience the freedom of residing in Panama by showcasing guaranteed income of over $1k per individual. This entitles you to obtain permanent residency, allowing you to embrace a life of golden years in a region blessed with year-round pleasant weather, affordable living, and the finest healthcare services in Latin America. Eligible income sources include social security, military pensions, and qualified annuities. Let us guide you on this exciting journey towards a fulfilled and secure future.

Book a Consultation
